update commission_settlement set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, settlement_sn = #{settlementSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_create_time = #{orderCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_total_pay = #{orderTotalPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, settlement_type = #{settlementType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_master_id = #{storeMasterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_manage_id = #{storeManageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, store_master_total_commission = #{storeMasterTotalCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_master_commission = #{storeMasterCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_manage_commission = #{storeManageCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, store_commission = #{storeCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, company_commission = #{companyCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, data_version = #{dataVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commission_status = #{commissionStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, settlement_end_time = #{settlementEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cross_fee = #{crossFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ext_status = #{extStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, belong_type = #{belongType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, biz_user_id = #{bizUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warn_status = #{warnStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(ifnull(d.store_master_commission,0)),0) as keeperToBeIncome, ifnull(sum(ifnull(d.store_manage_commission,0)),0) as managerToBeIncome, ifnull(sum(ifnull(d.store_commission,0)),0) as directorToBeIncome, ifnull(sum(ifnull(d.store_master_commission,0) + ifnull(d.store_manage_commission,0) + ifnull(d.store_commission,0)),0) as storeToBeIncome from commission_settlement s, commission_settlement_detail d where s.order_sn = d.order_sn and d.`status`=1 and s.store_id = #{userId} and d.brand_type = #{brandType}
